We went for lunch as a family of vegetarians, and they were very happy to make veggie versions of dishes for us. We had pad Thai, a red curry and a sweet and sour dish, all of which were delicious.
Great price, great staff very nice and funny , looked a lot and took care very well of us, the food is good and very well priced!

This is one of the better-priced restaurants in the area, but the food is really quite good. Service was efficient and the environment was pleasant. We all really enjoyed what we ordered and I'd gladly come back here for another lunch or dinner.

column7: Happy to cook according to your preference.
column9: I come here for take-away dinner and it's always very tasty. Food is of high quality and it's very cheap for what you're getting. If you want a dish in some other variation the chef is happy to cook it for you like you prefer....More

column9: The best Thai place in Lund. Very nice staff, really good food and not expensive at all. A little crowded at lunch and in my opinion it's nicer to take away than to eat there in the evening, but the place is ok.
